manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Life Fitness Row HX Trainer for Indoor Rowing Workout Perfect for a low-impact, total-body workout at home. Its beautiful design makes it a great addition to any room. Fluid Technology resistance delivers a smooth and natural feel. The Row HX accommodates the whole family and delivers premium performance from the convenience of your home.

Attention to Design The natural wood and tempered steel frame strike a balance between elegance and durability. The Row HX fits any decor and is a piece of exercise equipment that you can be proud to display.
Compact and Easy To Move The Life Fitness Home Rower is easy to move and has a small footprint to fit in any space. The rower is less than 7-feet (213 cm) tall when stored upright.

Easy Resistance Adjustability Five resistance levels are available at the turn of a dial, without the hassle of adding or siphoning water. Easy adjustments accommodate several users and allow users to challenge themselves with a variety of intensity.

About the Bluetooth Console Connect to the Row HX BT Console via Bluetooth and track your progress with your favorite fitness apps. Also compatible with Polar H7 and H10 heart rate monitors. The BT Console displays the following workout metrics: time, level, distance, strokes per minute, 500-meter split time, calories/hour, watts, and heart rate (requires compatible heart rate monitor).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, and great exercise
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived in two boxes: One large fat one that contained the main tank assembly, and one long one that contained the two long boards. Assembly was easy to follow and actually fun. One thing to keep in mind (for putting anything together really) is to get the fasteners finger-tight, then tighten them bit by bit, going fastener to fastener, until they're all tight. This will assure that everything will be level and very secure. Really, though, the assembly is pretty fool-proof if you can follow basic instructions.The exercise itself is very pleasant. I love the whooshing sound. Level 1 is pretty easy. Level 4 is noticeably more strenuous. You have to pull about 5 to 10 strokes before you'll feel a difference after you change the setting.I wish the LCD display was backlight. My workout area is dimly lit, and I want to keep it that way. But, the numbers are very easy to read if you can get some light on it.This is the one and only rower of any type I've purchased before, and this is likely the only one I'll ever need. I'm sure I'll get many years of use out of it. It's well built, beautiful, and bound to improve my health.Happy rowing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Will leak and waste money. Don’t bother. Get a concept 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can be ordered direct from Life Fitness via Apple Fitness+ "exclusive"
reviews.reviewText: I first tried to order this from Amazon but was told that it could not be shipped to my address. After a bit of searching I stumbled on a link from Apple Fitness+ directly to the unit on the Life Fitness website.Life Fitness accepted my order (at a lower price than seen here) and shipped directly to me using UPS -- placed the order on a Wednesday and the unit was delivered on the next Monday. Setup dead simple -- unit is basically fully assembled except for the side runners -- 8 bolts.Very happy with the functionality of the rowing feel/motion. The included console is very basic and doesn't connect to anything (even a heart strap) but it does show stroke rate, elapsed time.My guess is that, compared to the other leading name in water rowers, I paid a couple hundred dollars more for this machine. But the quality is very good, delivery was unbelievably fast and I'm glad I bought it!Just to repeat: I tried to buy this from Amazon first, but the order wasn't accepted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water rower!
reviews.reviewText: Costco was selling a nearly identical model (Life Fitness CX rower... basically the HX without Bluetooth) when I purchased it in August 2018 (but they are no longer sold there). I've now had my rower for nearly 2.5 years, & it has held up wonderfully with no issues. It's especially great to have in the midst of COVID. This model easily stands up for convenient storage & looks beautiful... like a nice piece of furniture. It's a great workout, & I love that the tank has a resistance dial (to me that was a very important feature as I tested a WaterRower brand one without the dial, & it felt inferior to what I bought). I also love the whooshing sound of the water & highly recommend this by rower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars got this at a wholesale store and cant be happier with it
reviews.reviewText: got this at a wholesale store and cant be happier with it. high quality and super smooth motion. The rower looks beautiful and water sounds when rowing are mesmerizing.
Me encanto el producto solo tardo un poco mas de lo esperado en llegar, pero 100% recomendado!
